chapters.title: Introduction to AWS
chapters.description: A brief overview of AWS and its key services and concepts.

chapters.title: AWS Global Infrastructure
chapters.description: Understanding AWS regions, availability zones and edge locations.

chapters.title: AWS EC2
chapters.description: Provisioning and managing virtual servers using Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud.

chapters.title: AWS S3
chapters.description: Using Amazon Simple Storage Service for cloud object storage.

chapters.title: AWS Database Services
chapters.description: Managed database options like RDS, DynamoDB and Redshift.

chapters.title: AWS Networking and Content Delivery
chapters.description: Services like VPC, CloudFront, Route 53 and API Gateway.

chapters.title: AWS Security, Identity & Compliance
chapters.description: IAM roles, security groups, AWS Organizations and compliance standards.

chapters.title: AWS Management Tools
chapters.description: Monitoring, automation and optimization using CloudWatch, CloudFormation and more.

chapters.title: AWS Storage and Archiving
chapters.description: Long-term data storage with S3 Glacier and Storage Gateway.

chapters.title: Getting Started with AWS
chapters.description: Creating an AWS account, basics of usage billing and the free tier.
